briefTitle: Impedance Cardiography: Clinical Evaluation of Endotracheal Cardiac Output Monitor (ECOM)
officialTitle: Impedance Cardiography: Clinical Evaluation of Endotracheal Cardiac Output Monitor (ECOM)

interventions.name: Placed ECOM endotracheal cardiac output monitor in patients undergoing cardiac surgery

summary:
1. Compare measurements of cardiac output derived from electrical measurements from electrodes on an endotracheal tube (ECOM or Endotracheal Cardiac Output Monitor) to those made from a pulmonary artery thermodilution catheter.
2. Establish the safety and efficacy of the ECOM system.

primaryOutcome.measure: Comparison of ECOM Impedance and Thermodilution Cardiac Output Measurements
